title: What happened to being told if an invite is a friend of a friend or something.
body:
http://image.prntscr.com/image/300e9bed6f7a40f289adf9e257212ead.png

So got this today, not on my friend's list, not in any clubs of mine, still tells me nothing of the person.

We either need a way to disable these invites, or to just be straight up told when it's not someone on our friend's list (even if it's they are in the club just have it name the club)

replies.body: [Oh good, another removed feature to add to my list. Thanks!](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/60tufe/complete_list_of_gripes_with_the_new_client/)
